post.text: With just days to go until the election, Republicans are pulling out all the stops to try to bring Hillary down. Share this to help set the record straight and get out the facts.

comment.author: Kegan
comment.text: They never would have found out about the emails if Weiner wasn't a pervert. After weeks of falsely accusing Trump of being a pervert.. Funny how these things work out.

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Falsely? The facts are straight from his mouth. The unbelievably poorly educated.

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Her staff needed immunity deals and she bleach bit emails. Talk about being uninformed you take the prize.

replies.author: Sabrina
replies.text: Huma is the connection and weiner is the weak link.
